text: [Create a free account](/?com=login&create=1)Support DU (and get rid of ads!): [Become a Star Member](/star) [Latest Breaking News](/?com=forum&id=1014) [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [The DU Lounge](/?com=forum&id=1018) [All Forums](/?com=forums) [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311) [Culture Forums](/?com=forum&id=1312) [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313) [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) [Support Forums](/?com=forum&id=1315) [Help & Search](/?com=search) Related: [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [Editorials & Other Articles](/?com=forum&id=1016), [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311), [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313), [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) (119,340 posts) Thu Jun 6, 2024, 05:43 PM 35 min ago [applegrove](/?com=profile&uid=164532) June 6, 2024 at 5:00 pm EDT By Taegan Goddard 92 Comments https://politicalwire.com/2024/06/06/trump-wants-january-6-committee-members-indicted/ "SNIP Donalld Trump fumed over a federal judge ordering his longtime ally Steve Bannon to report to prison, calling for members of the House panel that investigated the Jan. 6, 2021, riot to be indicted, The Hil l reports. Trumps post follows several interviews he gave this week in which he suggested it would be fair game for his political opponents to be prosecuted if he wins the White House in November. SNIP" [InfoView thread info, including edit history](/?com=thread&info=1&address=100219014250) [TrashPut this thread in your Trash Can (My DU » Trash Can)](/?com=login) [BookmarkAdd this thread to your Bookmarks (My DU » Bookmarks)](/?com=login)8 replies, 287 views [ShareGet links to this post and/or share on social media] [AlertAlert this post for a rule violation](/?com=login) [PowersThere are no powers you can use on this post] [EditCannot edit other people's posts] [ReplyReply to this post](/?com=post&post&forum=1002&pid=19014250) [EditCannot edit other people's posts] [Rec (11)] [ReplyReply to this post](/?com=post&forum=1002&pid=19014250) [NoneDon't highlight anything](#!)
